titleStmt.title: Three sermons preach'd upon extraordinary occasions. By Charles Robotham, B.D. rector, of Reisam in Norfolk
titleStmt.author: Robotham, Charles, 1625 or 6-1700.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for William Oliver bookseller in Norwich,

notesStmt.note: "The obedience of faith" and "The Christian's sacrifice" have separate dated title pages and separate pagination; register is continuous.
Copy filmed at UMI microfilm Early English Books 1641-1700 reel 2432 has pages tightly bound with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Sion College Library, London.
